def_cn: （尤指对个人或国家的）誓言，誓约
def_en: See also:Hippocratic oath; An oath is a formal promise, especially a promise to be loyal to a person or country.

def_cn: （在法庭上承诺说实话的）誓言
def_en: In a court of law, when someone takes the oath, they make a formal promise to tell the truth. You can say that someone is on oath or under oath when they have made this promise.

def_cn: （表示愤怒、震惊的）咒骂，诅咒
def_en: An oath is an offensive or emphatic word or expression which you use when you are angry or shocked.
